productCards.title: PostHog — The open source product OS
productCards.description: Open-source product analytics, session recording, feature flagging and A/B testing that you can self-host. Everything engineers need to build better products.

productCards.title: Statsig — #1 feature management and product experimentation platform
productCards.description: Statsig is the leading product experimentation platform that helps businesses use data to ship fast and build better products. Companies like OpenAI, Notion, Brex, and Eventbrite use Statsig to manage feature rollouts, automate experiments, and make decisions based on performance metrics. Founded in 2021 by former Facebook engineers, Statsig supports thousands of experiments impacting over a billion end users globally.

productCards.title: Adapty — Grow mobile in-app subscriptions 💵
productCards.description: Adapty is a service for analyzing and growing mobile in-app subscriptions. Use Adapty for paywalls A/B testing, measuring economy and customers promotion.

productCards.title: Glassfy — The in-app subscriptions platform
productCards.description: Glassfy open-source SDK provides you with subscription infrastructure, real-time subscription events and out-of-the-box monetization tools on iOS, Android, Stripe and Paddle.

productCards.title: GrowthBook — The open-source LaunchDarkly alternative
productCards.description: GrowthBook is an open source feature flagging and experimentation platform. Safely release features to production and measure the impact on your key metrics.

productCards.title: Countly — # 1 privacy-led product analytics
productCards.description: Ensuring privacy compliance by design, the Countly platform brings together user-friendliness, privacy, customization, and all-in-one functionality. We help individuals, teams, and organizations reach their product dreams by tracking their product's performance, user journeys, and behavior. Make the best of our advanced User Profiles, Dashboards, Crashes, Events, Funnels, A/B Testing, Surveys, Cohorts, and more. PS. Whether you have a mobile, web, desktop, or IoT app, we have you covered. <3

productCards.title: JetBrains — A suite of intelligent development tools
productCards.description: Powerful IDEs for most programming languages and technologies along with products for team collaboration.

productCards.title: GitHub Copilot Chat — AI chat features powered by Copilot
productCards.description: GitHub Copilot Chat is a companion extension to GitHub Copilot that provides conversational AI assistance throughout your software development journey in VS Code.

productCards.title: Groq Chat — An LPU inference engine
productCards.description: A new type of end-to-end processing unit system that provides the fastest inference for computationally intensive applications with a sequential component to them, such as AI language applications (LLMs)

productCards.title: ggml — ML tensor library to enable LLMs on consumer hardware
Cursor Copilot++ — Autocomplete redesigned to predict your next edit
productCards.description: A more powerful version of Copilot that can suggest mid-line completions and entire diffs. Trained to autocomplete on sequences of edits, it's quick to understand the change you're making.

productCards.title: Dify.AI — Open-source platform for LLMOps,Define your AI-native Apps
productCards.description: Dify.AI is an open-source platform for LLMOpsIt offers visual management of prompts, operations, and datasets. Create an AI app in minutes or integrate LLM into your app for continuous improvement.

productCards.title: LocalizeBot — Translate iOS app In 1 click
productCards.description: Simplifies app localization and helps you reach more users. Use a machine translation service to translate your App and App Store metadata. - Supported xliff and xcloc files. - Translate App Store metadata.

productCards.title: Continue — Continue enables you to create your own AI code assistant
productCards.description: Continue enables you to create your own AI code assistant inside your IDE. Keep your developers in flow with open-source VS Code and JetBrains extensions that can be connected to any model, any context, and anything else you need

productCards.title: Langfuse — Open Source LLM Engineering Platform
productCards.description: Langfuse is the open source LLM Engineering Platform. It provides observability, metrics, evals, prompt management and a playground and to debug and improve LLM apps. Langfuse is open. It works with any model, any framework, allows for complex nesting and has open APIs to build downstream use cases. Docs: https://langfuse.com/docs Github: https://github.com/langfuse/langfuse

productCards.title: Journalist — Instantly generate hundreds of high-quality articles.
productCards.description: Journalist is an AI Article Generator that generates high-quality articles for your business. With a few clicks, you're able to automate your content with well-structured, unique and optimised articles for your niche.

productCards.title: Supabase — The open source Firebase alternative
productCards.description: Supabase is an open-source backend-as-a-service that provides real-time databases, authentication, and API services. It enables developers to build and scale applications quickly without managing server infrastructure.

productCards.title: Firebase — An app development platform backed by Google
productCards.description: An app development platform that helps you build and grow apps and games users love. Backed by Google and trusted by millions of businesses around the world.

productCards.title: Appwrite — 100% open source alternative for Firebase
productCards.description: A secure open-source backend server provides the core APIs required to build web and mobile applications. Appwrite provides authentication, database, storage, functions, messaging, and advanced realtime capabilities.

productCards.title: Clerk — An authentication and user management platform
productCards.description: A complete suite of embeddable UIs, flexible APIs, and admin dashboards to authenticate and manage your users.

productCards.title: Plaid — The safer way for your users to link financial accounts
productCards.description: The tools developers need to create easy and accessible experiences for their users. With just a few lines of code, users can connect to more than 12,000 financial institutions.

productCards.title: Memberstack — Authentication & Payments for Webflow. Total design freedom.
productCards.description: Memberstack empowers you to build anything - from gated blogs, to social media platforms - all using Memberstack & Webflow (or, whatever else you use to build sites & apps). Over 3,000 companies like Slack, Reddit, and American Airlines use Memberstack to build scalable, custom membership experiences. You can build everything you need without coding - but, you can also incorporate your own code into your projects and scale with Memberstack to a full-blown react application.

productCards.title: Persona — Identity verification for any use case, starting at $0
productCards.description: Persona offers a suite of fully-automated identity verification components with worldwide coverage that can be configured and branded to create custom-tailored flows for any use case. Sign up for the Starter plan and start for free in <10 minutes.

productCards.title: WorkOS — Your app, Enterprise Ready
productCards.description: WorkOS provides APIs to make your app Enterprise Ready, with pre-built features and integrations required by IT admins. Start selling to enterprise customers with just a few lines of code. Add Single Sign-On (SSO), Directory Sync, Audit Logs and more to your app today.

productCards.title: Stytch — User infrastructure for modern applications
productCards.description: Stytch is a full stack authentication and authorization platform, whose APIs make it simple to seamlessly onboard, authenticate and engage users. Improve security and user experience by going passwordless.

productCards.title: ApparenceKit — Ship your mobile app in days, not months
productCards.description: ApparenceKit is a complete flutter boilerplate to help you ship a successful app on Android and iOS. Subscription, Notififications, Auth, Ads, translations, Architecture, Deployment....

productCards.title: Stripe — Financial infrastructure for the internet
productCards.description: Accept payments, send payouts, automate financial processes, and ultimately grow revenue.

productCards.title: Expo — An open-source platform for building native apps
productCards.description: Build, deploy, and quickly iterate on native Android, iOS, and web apps from the same JavaScript codebase.

productCards.title: Remotion — Create videos programmatically
productCards.description: Make real MP4 videos written in React using CSS, SVG, and WebGL to make interesting motion graphics. Use programming to dynamically make different variants of videos and automate it using server-side rendering.

productCards.title: Zapier — Connect your apps and automate workflows

productCards.title: Tailwind UI — Beautiful UI components, by the creators of Tailwind CSS
productCards.description: Beautifully designed, expertly crafted components and templates, built by the makers of Tailwind CSS.

productCards.title: Trigger.dev — The open source background jobs framework
productCards.description: Create long-running jobs directly in your codebase with features like API integrations, webhooks, scheduling and delays.

productCards.title: AWS Lambda — An event-driven, serverless computing platform

productCards.title: Shipixen — Create a blog & landing page in minutes
productCards.description: Create a production-ready landing page & blog with your branding, theme & pages. You get the code & an SEO-optimized website so you can focus on building, not setting up.

productCards.title: Albato — A no-code platform for all automations
productCards.description: Integrate your applications into automated workflows using a no code builder.

productCards.title: monday.com — One platform for managing any project, task, and workflow
productCards.description: Used by 180K+ global customers, monday.com is a customizable and easy-to-use work management platform that maximizes efficiency, boosts collaboration, and increases productivity. Easily plan, centralize, streamline, and automate your teams' work and projects by utilizing powerful features such as no-code automations, real-time notifications, customizable dashboards, 200+ pre-made templates, multiple views, 72+ integrations, and more. From idea to execution, manage it all on one robust platform.

productCards.title: Vercel — Seamless hosting for frontend developers

productCards.title: Docusaurus — Easy to maintain open source documentation websites

productCards.description: Strapi is the next-gen headless CMS, open-source, javascript, enabling content-rich experiences to be created, managed and exposed to any digital device.

productCards.title: Contentful — Launch faster with a modern content platform
productCards.description: More than a headless CMS, Contentful is the API-first content management platform to create, manage and publish content on any digital channel.

productCards.title: Directus — Instant no-code app and dynamic API for any SQL database
productCards.description: The Modern Data Stack 🐰 — Directus is an instant REST+GraphQL API and intuitive no-code data collaboration app for any SQL database.

productCards.title: Ghost — Publish online, build a business, work from home
productCards.description: The world's most popular modern open source publishing platform. A headless Node.js CMS used by Apple, Sky News, Tinder and thousands more. MIT licensed, with 30k+ stars on Github.

productCards.title: Notaku — Docs websites powered by Notion
productCards.description: Notaku creates awesome docs websites from your Notion pages It's like GitBook but using Notion for your CMS Notaku is not limited to docs websites, you can also build docs, blog, help desk, changelog and roadmap websites.

productCards.title: Linear — Manage software development and track bugs
productCards.description: Manage software development and track bugs. Linear's streamlined design is built for speed and efficiency to help high performing teams accomplish great things.

productCards.title: GitHub — How people build software
productCards.description: GitHub is a development platform inspired by the way you work.

productCards.title: JIRA — How teams do great
productCards.description: Create and track feedback for Atlassian products.

productCards.title: Trello — Visual collaboration with a shared perspective on projects
productCards.description: Trello is a web-based Kanban-style list-making application. Originally made by Fog Creek Software in 2011, it was spun out to form the basis of a separate company in 2014 and later sold to Atlassian in January 2017.

productCards.title: Sentry — Application monitoring and error tracking software
productCards.description: Self-hosted and cloud-based application monitoring that helps software teams see clearer, solve quicker, & learn continuously.

productCards.title: Asana — Track, manage, and connect your projects across any team
productCards.description: Stay on track, keep projects organized, and hit deadlines. See project progress, track individual tasks, plan sprints, integrate with other tools, and achieve successful launches.

productCards.title: Features.Vote — Listen to your users. Know what to build next.
productCards.description: Let your users post and vote on features they want, driving your product's growth with precision and clarity. 🚀

productCards.title: LogRocket — Stop guessing why bugs happen
productCards.description: LogRocket helps product teams build better experiences for their users. By recording videos of user sessions along with logs and network data, LogRocket surfaces UX problems and reveals the root cause of every bug.

productCards.title: GitHub Actions — Automate your workflow from idea to production
productCards.description: GitHub Actions makes it easy to automate all your software workflows, now with world-class CI/CD. Build, test, and deploy your code right from GitHub. Make code reviews, branch management, and issue triaging work the way you want.

productCards.title: EnlightUp — Enhance your products with customer feedback
productCards.description: Collect feedback from customers in one place to make better product decisions.

productCards.title: Circle — The all-in-one community platform for creators
productCards.description: Bring together your discussions, memberships, and content. Integrate a thriving community wherever your audience is, all under your own brand.

productCards.title: Memberstack — Authentication & Payments for Webflow. Total design freedom.
productCards.description: Memberstack empowers you to build anything - from gated blogs, to social media platforms - all using Memberstack & Webflow (or, whatever else you use to build sites & apps). Over 3,000 companies like Slack, Reddit, and American Airlines use Memberstack to build scalable, custom membership experiences. You can build everything you need without coding - but, you can also incorporate your own code into your projects and scale with Memberstack to a full-blown react application.

productCards.title: Buy Me a Coffee — A supporter is worth a thousand followers
productCards.description: Buy Me a Coffee is a beautiful way for creators to accept one-time and monthly support from their fans. Without stitching together a bunch of apps like Patreon, Mailchimp, and a donate button — you can accept support, memberships, and build a direct relationship with your fans. Your fans are going to love it.

productCards.title: staarter.dev — Launch Your Next SaaS Faster with staarter.dev
productCards.description: A comprehensive Next.js boilerplate that empowers developers to launch their SaaS applications quickly and efficiently. With features like authentication, subscription management, and localization, it provides a solid foundation so you can focus on innovating.

productCards.title: Ko-fi.com — Fund Your Passions.
productCards.description: Ko-fi is an online platform which helps creators such as illustrators, podcasters and bloggers receive financial support from fans of their work.

productCards.title: Framer — Design and ship your dream site with zero code
productCards.description: A no-code platform to create responsive webpages with text, links, media, and incredible animations.

productCards.title: Webflow — Create custom, responsive websites, visually
productCards.description: Take control of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in a visual canvas. Webflow generates clean, semantic code that’s ready to publish or hand to developers.

productCards.title: Bubble — Build web apps without code, entirely visually
productCards.description: Design, develop, and launch production-grade applications without code

productCards.title: Expo — An open-source platform for building native apps
productCards.description: Build, deploy, and quickly iterate on native Android, iOS, and web apps from the same JavaScript codebase.

productCards.title: Zapier — Connect your apps and automate workflows
productCards.description: Easy automation for busy people. Zapier empowers you to automate your work across 5,000+ apps—so you can move forward, faster.

productCards.title: Cycle — Your feedback hub, on autopilot
productCards.description: Cycle is the fastest way for your team to capture product feedback and share customer insights - without the busywork 👉 https://www.cycle.app

productCards.title: FlutterFlow — Build cross-platform mobile apps visually
productCards.description: Create beautiful UI, generate clean code, and deploy to the app stores or web in one click. Fully extensible with custom code.

productCards.title: Xano — The fastest way to build and deploy a scalable backend
productCards.description: Build a scalable backend for your app using no code. Transform, filter, and integrate with data from anywhere.

productCards.title: AWS Amplify — JavaScript library for app development using cloud services
productCards.description: AWS Amplify provides a declarative and easy-to-use API for cloud operations. You can build cloud-powered web and mobile experiences with AWS Amplify and goes well with any JavaScript based frontend library.

productCards.title: Retool — Build internal tools, remarkably fast
productCards.description: An application development platform that enables developers to combine the benefits of traditional software development with a drag-and-drop UI editor and AI to build internal tools radically faster. Deploy it anywhere, connect to any internal service, import your libraries, debug with your toolchain, and share it securely to users to ensure good and well-governed software by default.

productCards.title: Ruby on Rails — A full-stack framework to build amazing web apps
productCards.description: Rendering HTML templates, updating databases, sending and receiving emails, maintaining live pages via WebSockets, enqueuing jobs for asynchronous work, storing uploads in the cloud, providing solid security protections for common attacks. Rails does it all and so much more.

productCards.title: Cloudflare — The web performance & security company
productCards.description: Cloudflare is a leading edge network services provider that offers a wide range of solutions to enhance the security, performance, and reliability of websites and applications. With its global network infrastructure and advanced technologies, Cloudflare empowers businesses to build a faster, more secure, and resilient online presence.

productCards.title: Clerk — An authentication and user management platform
productCards.description: A complete suite of embeddable UIs, flexible APIs, and admin dashboards to authenticate and manage your users.

productCards.title: Telegram 4.7 — Cloud-based, secure messaging app
productCards.description: Telegram Messenger is a globally accessible freemium, cross-platform, encrypted, cloud-based and centralized instant messaging service.

productCards.title: Infisical — Helping dev teams sync environment variables
productCards.description: A simple, end-to-end encrypted platform that enables Node.js teams to sync and manage their environment variables. Developers can modify start/dev scripts to pull and inject environment variables into local environments with 1 line of code.

productCards.title: Persona — Identity verification for any use case, starting at $0
productCards.description: Persona offers a suite of fully-automated identity verification components with worldwide coverage that can be configured and branded to create custom-tailored flows for any use case. Sign up for the Starter plan and start for free in <10 minutes.

productCards.title: WorkOS — Your app, Enterprise Ready
productCards.description: WorkOS provides APIs to make your app Enterprise Ready, with pre-built features and integrations required by IT admins. Start selling to enterprise customers with just a few lines of code. Add Single Sign-On (SSO), Directory Sync, Audit Logs and more to your app today.

productCards.title: Stytch — User infrastructure for modern applications
productCards.description: Stytch is a full stack authentication and authorization platform, whose APIs make it simple to seamlessly onboard, authenticate and engage users. Improve security and user experience by going passwordless.

productCards.title: Sardine — A fraud and financial crime protection platform
productCards.description: Protect every customer interaction from financial crime. Used by banks, retailers, and fintechs to detect fraud patterns, prevent money laundering, and stop sophisticated scams.

productCards.title: Middesk — A business identity platform
productCards.description: A suite of identity products to help companies across the US verify their commercial customers.

productCards.title: Standuply: Poll & Survey Scrum Bot — Project Management Assistant for Slack and MS Teams
productCards.description: Standuply is the #1 Standup Bot. It runs asynchronous stand-up & retrospective meetings, Slack polls, and tracks team performance to automate your Agile processes.

productCards.title: ShipFast — Ship your startup in days, not weeks
productCards.description: The NextJS boilerplate with all the stuff you need to get your product in front of customers. From idea to production in 5 minutes.

productCards.title: Vite — Next Generation Frontend Tooling
productCards.description: Vite is a build tool that aims to provide a faster and leaner development experience for modern web projects. A dev server that provides rich feature enhancements. A build command that bundles your code, pre-configured to output highly optimized static assets.

productCards.title: Nuxt — The Vue framework for web architects
productCards.description: An open source framework to create performant and production-grade full-stack web apps and websites with confidence.

productCards.title: Cloudflare Pages — Build Fast Sites. In Record Time.
productCards.description: Cloudflare Pages is a JAMstack platform for frontend developers to collaborate and deploy websites.

productCards.title: Shipixen — Create a blog & landing page in minutes
productCards.description: Create a production-ready landing page & blog with your branding, theme & pages. You get the code & an SEO-optimized website so you can focus on building, not setting up.

productCards.title: Cloudflare Workers — Your site. Our network.
productCards.description: Build blazing fast websites by seamlessly deploying static assets alongside your APIs and application code.

productCards.title: Astro — The web framework that scales with you.
productCards.description: Build fast content-driven websites, powerful SPA web applications, dynamic server APIs and everything in-between.

productCards.title: Eleventy — A simpler static site generator.
productCards.description: A simpler static site generator. An alternative to Jekyll. Written in JavaScript. Transforms a directory of templates (of varying types) into HTML. Works with HTML, Markdown, JavaScript, Liquid, Nunjucks, Handlebars, Mustache, EJS, Haml, and Pug.

productCards.title: BoilerBay — Launch your dream project 10x faster
productCards.description: The NextJS Starter Kit with everything you need to ship your product in days, not weeks. From idea to production 10x Faster.

productCards.title: Startup Idea Tester — Test your idea in days not months
productCards.description: Startup Idea Tester is here to revolutionize the way you validate your business ideas. Designed for founders with a lot of ideas, this powerful boilerplate allows you to focus on the marketing aspects and starting getting quickly emails with a waitlist system.

productCards.title: Tandemz — Recruit research participants in just a couple of clicks
productCards.description: Find research participants from all over the world easily, for your interviews, usability tests, and surveys.

productCards.title: Octomind — Find bugs before your users do with AI
productCards.description: AI-powered testing tool for web apps that finds bugs before your users do. We only need your website’s URL. Our AI agent knows what to test, writes the tests and keeps them relevant. Run the tests from our app or plug them into your CI/CD pipeline.

productCards.title: Wallaby — JS test runner in your code editor
MailSlurp — Modern Email APIs for Developers and QA teams.
productCards.description: Create real, private email addresses on demand. Send and receive emails and attachments in application code and integration tests. Intuitive REST APIs and SDK Libraries. Free for personal use.

productCards.title: OpenAI Tools — Super App For Fine-tuning Datasets, Jobs, Metrics & Models
productCards.description: Toolkit to get the most out of your OpenAI account: Track API usage; Manage ChatGPT fine-tuning datasets; Create, monitor and cancel fine-tuning jobs; Review and visualize training logs; Test and compare fine-tuned and other models directly, and more.

productCards.title: OpenAI Assistants API — Designed to help developers build powerful AI assistants
productCards.description: The Assistants API is designed to help developers build powerful AI assistants capable of performing a variety of tasks.

productCards.title: FastAPI — A modern, fast web framework for building APIs with Python
productCards.description: A high performance, easy to learn, fast to code, and ready for production framework

productCards.title: replicate — source machine learning models with a cloud API
Tinybird — Turn raw data into realtime API at scale
productCards.description: Build analytical API endpoints in minutes with no backend involved. Ingest huge amounts of data, transform it with SQL, and create dynamic endpoints on it.

productCards.title: Upstash — Serverless data platform for Redis and Kafka
productCards.description: Serverless Redis and Kafka as a service with per request pricing. Use any Redis/Kafka clients. The built-in REST API enables use cases with serverless and edge functions.

productCards.title: Prisma — Turn your database into a GraphQL API
productCards.description: Prisma is a realtime GraphQL database layer. Connect directly from the frontend or build your own GraphQL server. - Compatible with existing tooling - Powerful GraphQL API - Runs everywhere

productCards.title: Clerk — An authentication and user management platform
productCards.description: A complete suite of embeddable UIs, flexible APIs, and admin dashboards to authenticate and manage your users.

productCards.title: Flatfile — Extensible API + event based platform for data-file import
productCards.description: The Flatfile Data Exchange Platform provides developers an easy, fast, and secure way to build your ideal solution for importing CSV, Excel, or other data-files, without compromising on flexibility. With our API-first, event-driven architecture developers can build fully customizable, powerful workflows that address any file-based import use case, combined with a highly intuitive experience designed for end-users. See the magic of Flatfile for yourself and get started today, it’s free!

productCards.title: Trigger.dev — The open source background jobs framework
productCards.description: Create long-running jobs directly in your codebase with features like API integrations, webhooks, scheduling and delays.

productCards.title: Recall.ai — The universal API for meeting bots
productCards.description: The universal API for meeting bots. Recall.ai provides a single API for meeting bots on every platform like Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams and more.

productCards.title: Remotion — Create videos programmatically
productCards.description: Make real MP4 videos written in React using CSS, SVG, and WebGL to make interesting motion graphics. Use programming to dynamically make different variants of videos and automate it using server-side rendering.

productCards.title: Twitch — Livestream multiplayer games & esports
productCards.description: Twitch is a video live streaming service operated by Twitch Interactive, a subsidiary of Amazon. Twitch is the world's leading live streaming platform for gamers and the things we love. Watch and chat now with millions of other fans from around the world.

productCards.title: Mux — How developers build online video
productCards.description: Mux Video is an API that enables developers to build unique live and on-demand video experiences.

productCards.title: Pexels — The best free stock photos & videos shared by creators
productCards.description: Free stock photos & videos you can use everywhere. Browse millions of high-quality royalty free stock images & copyright free pictures.

productCards.title: Netflix — Watch TV shows and movies online.
productCards.description: Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices. You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want without a single commercial – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover and new TV shows and movies are added every week!

productCards.title: StreamYard — The easiest way to create professional live streams
productCards.description: StreamYard is a live streaming studio in your browser. Interview guests, brand your broadcast, and much more. Stream directly to Facebook, YouTube, LinkedIn, and other platforms.

productCards.title: CompressX — Ultra video compression
productCards.description: Stop uploading your video to online website for compressing. CompressX helps you to compress your video up to 90% file size reduction without significant loss of quality while working totally offline.

productCards.title: Rewatch — Collaborative video workspace designed to help teams know more and move fast
productCards.description: Rewatch lets you securely save, manage, and search all your video content so teams collaborate faster and work just gets better.

productCards.title: Sieve — Process and search 24 hours of video in less than 10 mins
productCards.description: Sieve is an API that helps you store, process, and automatically search video data–instantly and efficiently. Find the 1% of data that’s interesting within petabytes of raw video, tag important metadata, and build high-quality datasets with Sieve.

productCards.title: YouTube Music — A music app from YouTube
productCards.description: Explore our music streaming app, ad-free! New users get 1-month free trial. Terms apply. Get all your favorite albums, live performances, and remixes on our app! Explore now. A new web player. A reimagined mobile app. Watch or listen. Albums, videos & more. It's all here.

productCards.title: MacPaw — We help machines help you
productCards.description: MacPaw is a software development company that develops and distributes software for macOS and iOS. MacPaw is the maker behind CleanMyMac X, Setapp, ClearVPN, SpyBuster and other products. In 2017, MacPaw acquired The Unarchiver and has been actively supporting the product since. Today, MacPaw products have more than 30 million users worldwide. Every fifth Mac on Earth has at least one app by MacPaw. The company was founded in 2008 in Kyiv, Ukraine.

productCards.title: Vercel — Seamless hosting for frontend developers
productCards.description: Vercel is a platform for frontend developers to deploy and manage web applications efficiently. It offers serverless infrastructure and integrations with popular frameworks and tools, focusing on performance and scalability.

productCards.title: DigitalOcean — A cloud platform to deploy, manage & scale apps of any size
productCards.description: Helping millions of developers easily build, test, manage, and scale applications of any size faster than ever before.

productCards.title: Render — Build, deploy, and scale your apps with unparalleled ease
productCards.description: A unified platform to build and run all your apps and websites with free SSL, a global CDN, private networks and auto deploys from Git.

productCards.title: Ruby on Rails — A full-stack framework to build amazing web apps
productCards.description: Rendering HTML templates, updating databases, sending and receiving emails, maintaining live pages via WebSockets, enqueuing jobs for asynchronous work, storing uploads in the cloud, providing solid security protections for common attacks. Rails does it all and so much more.

productCards.title: Amazon Web Services — Virtual private server and web hosting-Amazon Lightsail
productCards.description: Amazon Lightsail is an easy-to-use virtual private server (VPS) that offers simple management of cloud resources such as containers, at low, predictable prices.

productCards.title: Cloudflare — The web performance & security company
productCards.description: Cloudflare is a leading edge network services provider that offers a wide range of solutions to enhance the security, performance, and reliability of websites and applications. With its global network infrastructure and advanced technologies, Cloudflare empowers businesses to build a faster, more secure, and resilient online presence.

productCards.title: Laravel Framework — The PHP Framework for Web Artisans
productCards.description: Laravel is a web application framework with expressive, elegant syntax. We’ve already laid the foundation — freeing you to create without sweating the small things.

productCards.title: Remix — Next gen full stack web framework
productCards.description: A full stack web framework that lets you focus on the user interface and work back through web standards to deliver a fast, slick, and resilient user experience.

productCards.title: Convex — A better type of backend
productCards.description: Convex is a full-stack TypeScript development platform that keeps you focused on your product. Use our realtime database to build apps that are reactive by default. Integrate OpenAI into your workflows with builtin functions, scheduling, and vector search.

productCards.title: Postmark — Email for web applications
productCards.description: Trusted by thousands of developers, Postmark is a fast and reliable email delivery service. Send with Postmark to ensure your application's emails get to the inbox on time, every time.

productCards.title: PostHog — The open source product OS
productCards.description: Open-source product analytics, session recording, feature flagging and A/B testing that you can self-host. Everything engineers need to build better products.

productCards.title: Mixpanel — Event analytics everyone can use
productCards.description: An event analytics platform that allows anyone to get answers from their customer and revenue data in seconds. It offers powerful real-time charts and visualizations of how people interact with your digital products and company.

productCards.title: Plausible Analytics — Simple analytics for your website
productCards.description: A privacy focused, open source alternative to Google Analytics that lets you measure your traffic and gives you 100% data ownership.

productCards.title: June — The Simple Product Analytics App
productCards.description: June is product analytics for B2B SaaS. Get auto-generated reports focused on how companies use your product, not users

productCards.title: FullStory — Craft a more perfect digital experience
productCards.description: FullStory is your digital experience analytics platform for on-the-fly funnels, pixel-perfect replay, custom events, heat maps, advanced search, Dev Tools, and more.

productCards.title: UptimeRobot — Downtime Happens. Get Notified!
productCards.description: An uptime monitoring service that helps users to get acknowledged of the downtimes of their websites/servers and also track the performance of them. It is actively used by 600,000+ users with much more number of monitors being checked regularly.

productCards.title: umami — A self-hosted alternative to Google Analytics
productCards.description: Umami is a simple, easy to use, self-hosted web analytics solution. The goal is to provide you with a friendlier, privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics and a free, open-sourced alternative to paid solutions.

productCards.title: Metricool — Analyze, manage and measure your digital content
productCards.description: All in one site: web analytics, blog content, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, publication planner, real-time and more. The ultimate tool for analysing, managing and measuring the success of all your digital content and campaigns. Free of charge. Complete. Intuitive.

productCards.title: bunny.net — The content delivery platform that truly hops.
productCards.description: Experience performance like never before. bunny.net is a reliable, powerful and lightning fast CDN designed to offer incredible performance at the worlds most cost-effective pricing. Join over 100.000 websites and make your website as fast as a bunny!

productCards.title: Ugly Duckling — Consistency on 𝕏 made easier.
productCards.description: Ugly Duckling is a simple and affordable analytics tool that helps you stay consistent and grow on X. The first version of Ugly Duckling, a Chrome extension, received a warm reception from the community and garnered over 100 daily active users now makes a comeback as a web application with new sharing features, beautiful charts and community leaderboard.

productCards.title: Framer — Design and ship your dream site with zero code
productCards.description: A no-code platform to create responsive webpages with text, links, media, and incredible animations.

productCards.title: Webflow — Create custom, responsive websites, visually
productCards.description: Take control of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in a visual canvas. Webflow generates clean, semantic code that’s ready to publish or hand to developers.

productCards.title: Flutter — Build apps for iOS, Android, web, macOS, Windows, & Linux
productCards.description: Google's UI toolkit for crafting beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase.

productCards.title: Render — Build, deploy, and scale your apps with unparalleled ease
productCards.description: A unified platform to build and run all your apps and websites with free SSL, a global CDN, private networks and auto deploys from Git.

productCards.title: ShipFast — Ship your startup in days, not weeks
productCards.description: The NextJS boilerplate with all the stuff you need to get your product in front of customers. From idea to production in 5 minutes.

productCards.title: Bubble — Build web apps without code, entirely visually
productCards.description: Design, develop, and launch production-grade applications without code

productCards.title: Expo — An open-source platform for building native apps
productCards.description: Build, deploy, and quickly iterate on native Android, iOS, and web apps from the same JavaScript codebase.

productCards.title: Clerk — An authentication and user management platform
productCards.description: A complete suite of embeddable UIs, flexible APIs, and admin dashboards to authenticate and manage your users.

productCards.title: Nuxt — The Vue framework for web architects
productCards.description: An open source framework to create performant and production-grade full-stack web apps and websites with confidence.

productCards.title: Netlify — The composable platform for modern sites, stores, and apps.
productCards.description: Netlify is the foundation for Enterprises looking to modernize their web architecture. With Netlify, your team can ship faster, be more productive, reduce risk and complexity, and drive higher conversions and revenue. It features continuous deployment from Git across a global application delivery network, serverless form handling, support for AWS Lambda functions, and full integration with Let's Encrypt.
